summary: second dropdown for terminate calls doesn't localize
description: this might be a tricky one to figure out
under applications parking if you then click on the default lot in the upper right hand corner you'll see the parameters for the default lot
as you can see in the attached screenshot the very last dropdown menu before the submit changes button doesn't get localized despite the strings being in however the first menu directly above it does
i looked for obvious solutions but wasn't able to find one
the code creating the menus in lot.php reads so i reckon it has something to do with this drawselects and the menu labels getting passed through without gettext functionality somewhere
about where to look next

summary: custom destination does not handle gosub args properly
description: when creating a custom destination using gosub the form field allows the user to enter arguments between parentheses in the gui enter however the dialplan generated by freebpx assumes the user will not enter arguments and always appends to the user supplied gosub string i don't believe that empty parentheses are required for a gosub to work suggest removing them in all cases and allowing users to enter args if needed

summary: firmware variable not giving full url
description: when you use the firmware variable just setting in the xml file not the full path to the server so the phone is not finding the upgrade rule
it should be giving the phone the full url to the server
once i replace the url with the full path the upgrade works

reporting the following issues when setting a language to an extension freepbx settings asterisk sip settings language en freepbx applications extensions language en or blank if is dialed it plays correctly the voice in en english freepbx applications extensions language es if is dialed it plays correctly the voice in es spanish if is dialed it plays wrongly the voice in en english it is possible to manually fix editing the following file this way when is dialed it plays correctly the spanish language

summary: commercial endpoint manager aastra template suggestions
description: hi the following are suggested aastra template additions
i find these useful
not sure if they apply to all aastra phones
i have tested with the series

expose the important sip dial plan parameter using the default value for aastra phones global phone setting sip dial plan value note literal are needed enable phone settings global phone setting auto resync mode value global phone setting auto resync time value thanks tim miller dyck

summary: commercial endpoint manager won't download firmware
description: commercial epm installs some scripts without executable permissions resulting in firmware files not being able to be downloaded
these are the files more details are in this forum thread filing a bug report so it gets tracked through the right mechanism
thanks tim miller dyck

summary: aastra.cfg file not created in new install of commercial endpoint manager
description: this is on a new install of commercial endpoint manager after setting up an aastra template and assigning phones the mac configuration files are created but no aastra.cfg file is created
on a different system using epm this file was created
the aastra phones check for aastra.cfg but appear to not check for their specific mac configuration file if aastra.cfg is not present
as a result no aastra phones get any configuration
regards tim miller dyck

summary: page pro page and announce via scheduler only plays seconds of recording
description: page pro page and announce via scheduler only plays seconds of recording
if i call the page group from another extension the entire announcement is played
it only behaves this way when run via schedule
